review:
I would like to share my latest consulting experience with Dr. Jyothsna Madan.

Dr. Jyothsna is a nice, calm, well poised, caring, well behaved and extremely welcoming doctor. * ***** *** ** ****** * After we came out of the visit, both of us were extremely happy that finally we found the right doctor. There was no other doubts thereafter.

Before consulting Dr. Jyothsna, we had consulted one of the Gynecologist in Narayana Health hospital for  frequent stomach pain, they confirmed that there was some issues in right ovary ( ovary torsion) and asked us to get ready for the surgery without any delay. but that was ridiculous as they were hiding something and said surgery cost is in 3 to 4 lakhs. suddenly we got shocked and started thinking about some second opinion. 
One of my friends suggested Dr.Jyothsna who is so experienced works in Manipal Hospital Jayanagar.  We have shown the reports (Narayana Health) but she strongly suspect ectopic pregnancy and immediately started pelvic scanning. She conformed the exact issue but sent us for one more scanning ( sri hari diagnostics) to double confirm the issue. yes, Radiologist doctor Krishna immediately provided the report in his busy schedule based on Jyothsna recommendation. It was so emergency situation as the surgery should happen immediately.
Dr. Jyothsna coordinated with manipal hospital staffs to set up OT to start the surgery immediately and completed the it without any delay. she is very good and honest doctor. she fought with Hospital management to reduce the overall surgery cost as no doctor will fight with hospital management.**** *** * ********* ******I would like to say many thanks to madam for dedicated support. I would recommend her for any treatment related to Gynecology.

Regards
Santhosh

Dr. Jyothsna Madan is very humble compassionate and her decisions are very clear and straight forward.  Unless there seems a complication that exists, she would never suggest for C-Section. My wife had a normal delivery and the service rendered by the hospital is excellent. Nurse here are really supportive and helping. Thanks to the entire team who made our day. Especially great thanks to Dr. Jyothsna for supporting my wife during her fag end of pregnancy. We were misguided by a doctor whom we were consulting since inception and that Dr. Jyothsna helped us from coming out of that chaotic situation and to take the right decision.

****** ** ****** **** *** straight forward nature , *** ***** ******* *** *** *********** ****** But one thing I didn't liked that she is not so patient friendly ,if you ask couple of simple question she gets irritated. I believe docotor freindly talk and motivating words means a lot. My wife struggles a bit to communicate with docotor. Docotor won't provide much room for interactions.I expect friendly nature and some time for interaction with docotor.Other than this one point she good. I will recommend this docotor (but not strongly)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a very bad experinece with this doctor,Jyotsana Madan.
I went there for my confirmation pregnancy check up after a long wait of 8 years.
This doctor asked me for some old reports which i had taken 1 year back & i had not taken it. She started shouting & yelling  at mewho was pregnant for 2.months  for 15 mnts .i was shocked to see a doctor behaving like that to a pregnant lady .She made the situation difficlut and me  wait an hour after the accusing session  ,I was on the verge of crying but she didnt bother.
I was very sad coming out of that hospital seeing this doctor instead of being happy being pregnant after a long wait.She is a doctor with non empathy ,arrogant ,rude * ** *********   .The next day with all these i got a little bleeding and she made me undergo the same  scan  which i took the previous day,*** **** ** *** **** *** *** ****** ***** ** **** * ****** ****I left this doctor Jyotsana Madan  and went to another doctor *** ******** ** *** **** ** **** * **** ** **** ***** *** *** ********* *** *** **** *** *** ******Hence guys dont go with Jyotsana madan,*** **** **** *** ********* *** ******** ******** *** ****

We went to Dr Jyothsna based on practo reviews study. We had been to Cloudnine for anamoly scan which was very satisfactory so choose same hospital with obstetrics. We were impressed with the previous report study since my wife was 5 month pregnant. She was able to grasp each parameters and was able to conclude on baby health. Further a injection, tablets and test prescription ended our visit purpose. Everything happened within no time and we were able to receive some precautions based on the report. Report check and month after visit from today check was the final statement. So its very satisfactory to be associated with this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Pregnancy is one the most important stages of life, and one absolutely want everything to go absolutely right, which is the case with Dr. Jyotsna.
We are the ones who do lot of home work before making a decision.
Our dear Dr is so lovely & lively as the moonlight. Let us share my experience here,

Every time we had a consultation, Our Dr helped us understand details of the pregnancy progress, which was pretty awesome, and we felt included, 
Now there were couple of critical times during the course of the pregnancy, wife went on to become diabetic with increased amniotic fluid, immediately doctor recommended reliable diets to get it under control, And during the 22nd Week wife went on to show early signs of real delivery pains, doctor ensured to have the complete term to be completed, with finest medical treatment, and finally on the 38th we bought lovely lil girl into our world, Must tell you this whole process is a three way affair, its husband wife and the Dr, its as important for each on to be involved in the process,

We are extremely grateful to Dr. Jyotsna for all the help, support, love and utmost care in bringing our little girl into this world, lots of love <3<3<3

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.Jyotsna towards the ending of my 1st pregnancy. Dr.Jyotsna is extremely friendly, humorous n polite. She explains the issues in a lucid manner n guides her patients with utmost care. She doesn't bother about money n makes sure we do what's best for the mother as well as the baby. She's sharp n makes right decisions in a quick span. I really appreciate her way of diagnosis n treatment. She's awesome n I love her..

My visit was not satisfactory as the doctor was short tempered (She said, she is continuously checking the patients from afternoon). Her questions will not be clear, but she needs perfect answers to them. She will hardly spend 2 to 3 minutes for your 650 Rs.

She is not at all Friendly and i don't recommend her

Dr jyothsna is a very compassionate and kind doctor. She had delivered my baby six years back, and even after 6 yrs when I visited her she remembered my husband and me. Even my meditation history and background she could recollect. We feel quiet at ease with her.

We were recommended to visit Dr. Jyothsna after we were not satisfied with our consultation with a doctor at a leading chain. She not only changed our worries to relief but guided us like a guardian and our us at ease . Needless to say we will be continuing with her and thanks all to her .

I consulted her for a single time, in which the waiting period was more than half an hour. Because she arrived late that day and there was one more patient before me. She explained the condition briefly. The given treatment was sort of satisfying *** *** **** ********* ** *********

review:

You have been much more to me than just a doctor. You have been my therapist, supporter, friend, well wisher and angel in disguise. Thank you Jyothsna mam😊

Excellent experience with madam. I am fully satisfied and confident. I know I am in safe hands. I suggested many friends to consult jyothsna madam. She is more than a doctor to every would be mother. She gives a cutest smile that all the worries fly off. Madam I thank you for your suggestions and support. I will be thankful to you forever.

The experience was not good..
Don't have words to explain it was that bad...
We had visited since we were planning for pregnancy.. she literally doesn't have time for patients.. I recommend you to choose some other doctor instead of this one who doesn't want to give you time.* *** ***** ** ** *** ******** ** *** **** *** *** ****** *** ** ******** *** ** **** *** **** **** ***** I hadn't organized the file because of my own reasons it doesn't mean she has rights to shout at me.. I was in my own tensions and in that state I was replying her in English though I knew Kannada it doesn't mean she has the rights to shout at me.. when a patient visits a doctor they will have multiple taughts in there mind.. also tensions related to health and surrounding situations.. I really look forward for a doctor who can calm me down and give positive vibes.. a strict no for this doctor.. I personally will never visit her in my life..

review:
Dr.jyothsna madan is such a wonderful doctor.she is very cool and makes the patient comfortable.From pregnancy till delivery it will be definitely a smooth experience.She will make even the anxious patients to be cool with a bright and warm smile.Also she is very patient in answering all the queries.
She is very friendly with the patients which reduces the high level anxiety during delivery.
She handles patients with utmost care
I would highly recommend her to anyone who is looking for a smooth pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi all, 
She is wonderful and very friendly. She has made sure that  I should delivery a healthy baby and she gave me a motherly touch during pregnancy  now I have  8 days baby . Actually mine is a IVF conception and had spent lot of money for the treatment but she understood that part and made sure that in pregnancy I should not go through financial difficulties whereevet possible she really helped me. I recommend every lady who is pregnant to  consult Dr. Jyothsna Madan.  She is very humble and down to earth. I am very grateful to god that he has shown me a right doctor. 

Thanks,
Bindumathi Dhanraj

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had visited Doctor Jyothsna Madan madam for pregnancy after a miscarriage 1year back with full of sadness...

Now we are extremely happy as we blessed with baby boy :):) with the blessings and treatment of Jyothsna madam.

In one word... Jyothsna madam is  goddess for us.

The way madam explains the problem, medication and the treatment is awesome..

Jyothsna madam always responds and clear all the queries with patience and cool.

She always made us comfortable and clear and straightly explains the problem and the treatment require.

We are very thankful to Madam but we don't know how to express the same to madam.

We are excited and enjoying these wonderful moments.

A big thanks to Jyothsna madam who is reason behind our happiness.

We consulting Dr. Jyothsna Madan for our second child (preg& birth - baby of arhsiya) first 7 years back @ Ramakrishna Sevesrama and second @ cloudnine jayanagar,

She is an excellent gynecologist, very professional and good to explains everything in detail.very soft and polite,

Thanks to doctor ,..she's highly recommend

Our experience with Dr. Jyothsna was amazing and totally pleased with All the services provided by the entire staff and I would gladly recommend my family members and other friends to consult MALATHI MANIPAL for medical services .. And i will continue to approach hospital services frequently if required in future
Doctor was good but can spend some more time with patients in terms of listening their issues. But overall happy with consultation output

review: The doctor is really very nice. More than half of the stress went away just by speaking with her. She is so sweet, confident and caring. She made me so comfortable and relaxed, that now I'm confident that everything good will happen.
